title: Black screen
body:
Hey, guys. I saw a lot of people talking about crash problems or having problem of installing 6.15... but I didn`t see post for my problem. So I updated it, then I login and started a game... But when it ask me to join room - kaboom.... Nothing there and just a black screen...
[IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/2ypkqgw.jpg[/IMG]

replies.body: This black screen might be due to a connection issue with your network, which is having trouble downloading assets to your client.  I recommend checking out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) guide for a series of steps to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards, and I'd be happy to help!
